testcaseName: Dose #1 Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine Dose #2 Novavax Covid-19 vaccine

administeredDoses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

doses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

generalDescription: This test case describes when an adult is administered Pfizer's Covid-19 vaccine as the first dose and Novavax's Covid-19 as a second dose that the doses are valid. Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: v4.27 Updated Forecast Dates to align with the current Interim Clinical Considerations (09/2/2022) for a new bivalent mRNA booster 8 weeks after completion of a monovalent primary series; it replaces all prior booster recommendations for this age group.
